reuters.title: MINNESOTA LASER INTRODUCES NEW SURGICAL LASERS
reuters.body: Minnesota Laser Corp said it introduced a new line of Coagulase Series Nd:YAG surgical laser systems. It said the lasers use 400 micron fiberoptics designed for endoscopic, microscopic and freehand surgical applications in gynecology, urology, gastroenterology and pulmonology. Reuter 
